00014 class Conversion {
00015     public:
00016         // Converts APOXI_KEY_0 .. 9, STAR, HASH to the corresponding IA5 code.
00017         // Returns 0x00 if invoked with other KeyCode.
00018         static UINT8 KeyCode2IA5(const KeyCode key);
00019

00021         // APOXI KeyCode. Returns APOXI_KEY_NONE if invoked with other key value.
00022         static KeyCode IA52KeyCode(const UINT8 key);
